DOC.brief_summary: This study HDL function healthy individual classify three group accord HDL-cholesterol level ( Low HDL-C , Intermediate HDl-C High HDL-C ) , purpose investigate characteristic HDL particle might associate atherosclerotic burden , characterize carotid intima-media thickness 1mm .
DOC.brief_title: Association Between HDL Functions Atherosclerotic Burden Healthy Individuals
DOC.detailed_description: Selection : Study participant initially select trough evaluation consecutive lipid profile individual spontaneously seek governmental primary care center city Campinas , Sao Paulo , Brazil . Telephone-based screen interview perform , follow in-person clinical evaluation blood exam . Biochemical analysis : Glucose , triglyceride , HDL-C c-reactive protein ( CRP ) measure automate Modular® Analytics Evo ( Roche Diagnostics , Burgess Hill , West Sussex , UK ) , use Roche Diagnostics® reagent ( Mannheim , Germany ) . LDL-cholesterol calculate Friedewald formula . Serum insulin level measure use ELISA ( Millipore , Massachusetts , USA ) . The Homeostasis Model Assessment ( HOMA ) Calculator version 2.2 ( University Oxford , UK ) use estimate insulin sensitivity . Apolipoproteins A-I B-100 lipoprotein ( ) determine nephelometry automated system reagent Dade-Behring® ( Marburg , Germany ) . Carotid artery ultrasound : Carotid artery atherosclerosis estimate use high-resolution B-mode ultrasound , posterior wall common carotid artery . Lipoprotein isolation : HDL study participant isolate plasma , ultracentrifugation ( Beckman Coulter Inc. , Palo Alto , USA ) . HDL chemical composition : Using commercially available enzymatic kit , HDL content total protein , total cholesterol , free cholesterol , phospholipid , triglyceride apolipoprotein A-I measured . Cholesteryl ester ( CE ) calculate difference total cholesterol free cholesterol time 1.67 . HDL molar concentration estimate base particle total mass molecular weight . HDL physical-chemical characterization : HDL particle size determine use dynamic light scattering , zeta potential use laser Doppler micro-electrophoresis . Determination proteins involve HDL metabolism : Cholesteryl ester transfer protein , phospholipid transfer protein , lipoprotein lipase , hepatic lipase lecithin : cholesterol acyl transferase activity determine trough radiometric exogenous assay . HDL function : Cholesterol efflux capacity , antioxidant activity , susceptibility oxidation , anti-inflammatory activity platelet aggregation inhibition measure use straightforward consolidated methodology . Statistical Analyses : Differences group evaluate use ANOVA Kruskal-Wallis , Bonferroni 's post-hoc multiple comparison analysis , accord variable distribution . Chi-Square use compare categorical data . Analysis covariance ( ANCOVA ) adjust confound variable also use , check variable histogram , normality plot , residual scatter plot test linearity , normality , variance . Pearson 's correlation test use assess relationship variable . A two-sided p-value 0.05 consider significant .
DOC.criteria: glucose < 100 mg/dL Urea < 71 mg/dL Creatinine < 1.20 mg/dL Uric acid < 7.0 mg/dL Alanine aminotransferase < 50 U/L Aspartate aminotransferase < 33 U/L Gammaglutamyl transferase < 71 U/L Alkaline phosphatase < 129 U/L Thyroid stimulate hormone 0.41 4.50 μUI/mL Free thyroxin 0.9 1.8 ng/dL Symptomatic cardiovascular disease LDLcholesterol ≥130 mg/dL Triglycerides ≥150 mg/dL Metabolic syndrome BMI ≥ 30 kg/m2 Smoking habit Daily intake alcohol > 14g Regular use medical treatment
